snapshot

Methods for interacting with the Snapshot endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#snapshot

Methods

create(parameters)

Create a snapshot from an existing virtual machine. The virtual machine does not need to be stopped.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#snapshot_create
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
SUBID number Unique identifier of a subscription.
description string <optional>
 Description of snapshot contents.
Source:
  • snapshot.js, line 7

createFromUrl(parameters)

Create a new snapshot on the current account. The snapshot will be downloaded from a given URL.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#snapshot_create_from_url
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
url string Remote URL from where the snapshot will be downloaded.
Source:
  • snapshot.js, line 33

delete(parameters)

Destroy (delete) a snapshot. There is no going back from this call.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#snapshot_destroy
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
SNAPSHOTID string Unique identifier for this snapshot.

List all snapshots on the current account.

parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description

 Filter result set to only contain this snapshot.
